title: E-Commerce Delivery & Returns Management
content: I run an e-commerce fulfillment center where trucks deliver online orders to customers and pick up returns on the same trip. Some customers receive packages, while others have items to send back. The locations of the warehouse and the 20 delivery/return stops are `<locs>`. The delivery demand is `<demand_linehaul>`, and the return demand is `<demand_backhaul>`. Each truck has a capacity of `<capacity>`. I need to plan routes so that deliveries and pickups happen efficiently, trucks aren’t overloaded, and drivers avoid unnecessary detours to save time and fuel.

title: Library Book Distribution & Returns Routing
content: Our county library system sends out vans to drop off new books at branch libraries and pick up old ones for restocking or repairs. I need to design routes that ensure all branches get their books on schedule while collecting returns—without making vans backtrack or exceed their capacity.

content: My company delivers new refrigerators, washing machines, etc., to homes and picks up old appliances for recycling. Each truck has space for new units (deliveries) and old ones (pickups).
